org.apache.abdera2.model
Interface Div

All Superinterfaces:
Base, Cloneable, Element, ExtensibleElement, Iterable<Element>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FOMDiv
public interface Div
extends ExtensibleElement

Represents an XHTML div tag.
